  Error evaluating generator expression:

    \$<TARGET_POLICY:NOT_A_POLICY>

  \$<TARGET_POLICY:prop> may only be used with a limited number of policies.
  Currently it may be used with the following policies:

   \* CMP0003
   \* CMP0004
   \* CMP0008
   \* CMP0020
   \* CMP0021
   \* CMP0022
   \* CMP0027
   \* CMP0038
   \* CMP0041
   \* CMP0042
   \* CMP0046
   \* CMP0052
   \* CMP0060
   \* CMP0063
   \* CMP0065
   \* CMP0068
   \* CMP0069
